About Me

A little bit about me...

BIO

Hi! I am Chi, a web developer and software developer with a keen eye for design. I am currently based in the beautiful city of Seattle, WA. I am passionate about emerging and immersive technology and using it to solve the inefficiencies in our world. Before discovering the joy of coding, I accumulated diverse experience working in a wide range of industries including Investment Banking, Financial Tech, and Consumer Goods. I enjoy dissecting problems from different angles and wrestling with questions to find optimal solutions.

When I am not coding, you might find me hiking, skiing, learning to dance salsa, or reading.

Freelance

Full Stack Web Developer

I create wireframes, design user experience based on my clients' requirements, and develop both front end and back end codebase for full-stack projects. Technologies I use most often include JavaScript with React.js,and C# with .Net framework, and MySQL and MongoDB for the databases.

Unilever

Sales Analyst

I analyzed sales performance of over $400 Million product portfolio which Unilever sells via one of its largest customers. I created POS reports and researched the sales data for insights which would then be used by my business leaders for their decision making.

Clearwater Analytics

Senior Client Service Analyst

Clearwater is a Software-as-a-Service Financial Tech company that provides software for data reconciliation and reporting on more than $3 trillion in assets on a daily basis. My role consisted of managing data reconciliation of $11+ Billion investment portfolio and liaised with 13 clients and engineering team to ensure successful Agile sprints.
